mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM camp_cart WHERE goods_no=#{goods_no} AND type=#{type} AND issale!=1 AND id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO camp_cart VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(cart_no)+1, 1) FROM camp_cart), #{goods_no}, #{type}, #{amount}, #{price}, #{id}, 0, 0, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT cart_no,goods_no,amount,regdate,issale,ischeck,price, (SELECT poster FROM goods1 WHERE gno=camp_cart.goods_no) as poster, (SELECT title FROM goods1 WHERE gno=camp_cart.goods_no) as title, (SELECT selling_price FROM goods1 WHERE gno=camp_cart.goods_no) as selling_price FROM camp_cart WHERE id=#{id} AND issale!=1 ORDER BY cart_no DESC
